means: 匹兹堡（美国宾西法尼亚州西南部城市，是美国的钢铁工业中心）

sentence.Network_en: The newspaper presses are rolling in Pittsburgh again today.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天，匹兹堡的报纸又开始印刷了。

sentence.Network_en: When I'm in Pittsburgh, I call him up.
sentence.Network_cn: 我每到匹兹堡，都给他打电话。

sentence.Network_en: By the turn of the century, Pittsburgh had the highest death rate in the United States.
sentence.Network_cn: 至世纪之交时，匹兹堡的死亡率居全美之首。

means.word_mean: 1. a city in southwestern Pennsylvania where the confluence of the Allegheny River and Monongahela River forms the Ohio River; long an important urban industrial area; site of Carnegie-Mellon University and the University of Pittsburgh
